articles.author: Ganesh Rao, Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: European markets open flat ahead of Trump's inauguration as the 47th president of the U.S. - CNBC
articles.description: European markets start the new trading week flat, with market attention on the inauguration of U.S. President-elect Donald Trump.
articles.content: European markets have started the new trading week flat, with market attention on the inauguration of U.S. President-elect Donald Trump later in the day.Most major indexes were marginally in the gree… [+1116 chars]
